body_html: Closed since it appears close enough to naive softmax. Presumably this example needs to be tuned more. The word language model https://github.com/pytorch/examples/tree/master/word_language_model also converges and matches the CUDA version.

body: Closed since it appears close enough to naive softmax. Presumably this example needs to be tuned more. The word language model https://github.com/pytorch/examples/tree/master/word_language_model also converges and matches the CUDA version.
